about.title: Curious about me? Here you have it:
p: I'm a Frontend Developer who loves building fast, scalable, and thoughtfully crafted web applications. I specialize in Angular and enjoy turning complex requirements into clean architecture, smooth interactions, and interfaces that simply feel great to use.

Over the past 3.5+ years, I've worked on dashboards, enterprise platforms, and large E-government systems where performance, maintainability, and reliability were essential. Iâ€™ve also led a frontend teamâ€”guiding developers, reviewing code, and shaping consistent architectures that scale.

Driven by curiosity, I always look deeper: how things work, why they work, and how they can work better. I believe great engineering is a blend of logic, creativity, and continuous refinement. I enjoy exploring modern tools, best practices, and design patterns that elevate both code quality and user experience.

When Iâ€™m not writing code, you'll probably find me learning something new, improving my workflow, or spending time with the people who matter most. I'm always open to challenges, conversations, and opportunities that help build meaningful products.
One last thing â€” Iâ€™m always open to new projects, conversations, and collaborations. Feel free to reach out anytime. I don't bite, I promise ðŸ˜‰

skills.title: Technologies, Tools & Skills I Excel At:

experience.title: Here is a quick summary of my most recent experiences:

experiences.title: Software developer
description: Delivered projects for ministries and companies.
Collaborated with client teams and trained users.
Introduced reusable components and Angular upgrades.

projects.title: Some of the noteworthy projects I worked on and contributed to building:

projectsList.name: Organizo
projectsList.description: Built from scratch as a zero-code platform to digitalize enterprise processes, integrating CMS, Document Management, Case Management, DSS, and more, targeting the UK market.
contributes: Designed scalable architecture adopted across company projects

projectsList.name: Correspondence Management System
projectsList.description: Scalable solution on IBM FileNet for managing incoming, outgoing, and internal memos with workflows and streamlined document tracking.

projectsList.name: Ministry of Interior - Archiving System
projectsList.description: Dynamic archiving system on IBM FileNet for creating custom forms, applying rules, attaching documents, and indexing files efficiently.

projectsList.name: Al-Noor Case Management
projectsList.description: Case management system for Al-Noor Care Center to automate student registration, track cases, and manage school and rehabilitation data efficiently.

projectsList.name: Q-Chem File Management
projectsList.description: FileNet-based solution for Q-Chem to structure electronic files, design workflows, and manage records efficiently with streamlined processes.

projectsList.name: Decision Support System
projectsList.description: Internal improvement platform rebuilt entirely as a graduation project in collaboration with Smart Software Solutions.
projectsList.addedDescription: Rebuilt entirely as a graduation project in collaboration with Smart Software Solutions.

projectsList.name: Tender
projectsList.description: Meeting management solution on IBM FileNet for organizing agendas, recording decisions, and tracking activities efficiently.

projectsList.name: Loyality
projectsList.description: Loyalty system for Syria International Islamic Bank to manage customer rewards and provide partners with a dashboard to track vouchers.

projectsList.name: Reserva
projectsList.description: Online restaurant reservation app allowing users to book tables on specific dates and review all their reservations efficiently.
